features: Thermal Mapping® technology provides warmth where you need it with down insulation, while areas prone to overheating are crafted in more breathable fabrics
Dynamic Knit fabric is strategically placed at flex points for added range of motion, enhanced fit and breathability
360° Reflectivity: Signature double-stripe reflective details at back of collar and wrap-around reflective details at elbows add visibility in low light
Interior backpack straps allow jacket to be carried hands-free over the shoulders
Chin guard is lined with tricot fabric for added softness and comfort
Recessed Power Stretch® cuffs to lock in warmth and enhance fit. Outer cuffs are scalloped to add extra coverage and protection
Articulated sleeves and underarm gussets enhance fit and add range of motion
Storm flap underneath 2-way zipper keeps the elements out. Unzip from the bottom for added range of motion or venting
3 exterior pockets: 2 hand pockets with zipper closures and tricot fabric at knuckle side for softness and warmth, chest pocket with zipper closure
